descriptionHtml:
Since my first Retex was pretty well I decided to make different styles and upload them one after another.

This time it\'s an icy-blue version like made from a \"Frost-Dragon\". I hope you like it.

Installation:
Just put the unzipped folder to your ..\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures folder.

Uninstall:
Just delete or rename the files/folder.

My other styles for Dragonscale:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2023 (Bloody / Red Style)
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2486 (Swamp-Style)
author: Benden1985
